alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 18 at 3:24AM MDT until April 19 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 7 inches, with locally higher accumulations to 12 inches possible on the western sides and foothills of the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Fergus County below 4500ft and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to Noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds and wet snow could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of snow and strong winds could result in localized blizzard conditions at times tonight into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
